name: 1D Game (CRG Media Group)
description:
"1D Game" is a unique space arcade shooter with a titular catch - the screen space is 1 dimensional.

The aim of the game is to fire at red attackers to defend your base - the core. The core is in the middle and will change colour based on it's health (it can take five shots).

CONTROLS

Left mouse button to fire

Right mouse button to switch sides
